name: Ambit Energy
overview: The Energy Deregulation The deregulation of energy markets across the country means you can now tap into a $500 BILLION BUSINESS! DONALD TRUMP say’s “AMBIT IS ONE OF THE FASTEST GROWING COMPANIES IN U.S. HISTORY AND ONLY JUST BEGINNING TO WALK ACCORDING TO THEIR TOP BRASS” That should mean a lot coming from one of the most wealthiest people in the country! who is also an affiliate of AMBIT ENERGY. Don’t wait for a company to be at its “TOP BRASS” to join! EVERYBODY USES ENERGY! Over 5 million customers to reach in NY alone. So far, NY, TX, and IL are deregulated We need energetic consultants their. CHECK THIS OUT! EVERYONE OF YOUR CUSTOMERS WILL RECEIVE A FREE 3-DAY 2-NIGHT GETAWAY JUST FOR TRYING! WITH NO CONTRACTS!! PLUS OTHER BONUSES LIKE CRUISES AND AIRLINE MILEAGE POINTS EVERYTIME THEY PAY THEIR BILLS! And when they pay their bills you get a piece! imagine in a few months when your cust. downline reaches a few thousand and your getting $1 & $2 or more per customer every month… I think you get the point! EVERYBODY’S YOUR CUSTOMER! YOU ALSO WILL BE SAVING THEM UP TO IN SOME CASES 26% OF THEIR ENERGY BILLS!!
